Class BoardColored

  • java.lang.Object
    • BoardColored
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardLayout
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoardColoredOne, BoardColoredTwo

    public class BoardColored
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoardLayout
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Class: BoardColored File: BoardColored.java Description: A class that handles the re-coloring of the board. Implements the BoardLayout interface, and uses the strategy pattern.
    See Also:
    History Log: Created on April 5, 2016, 07:00 PM ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
